title: Tuifinriat ang khawngaihna hi
lyrics:
Tuifinriat ang khawngaihna hi,
Tui liam angin ngilneihna,
Nunna Lal thianghlim thihna hi,
Ka nun tlanin a thi a.

Tu nge a hmangaih haiderin,
Fak lo tu nge awm thei ang?
Tawp lo tawpin van awm chhungin,
Amah an theihnghilh lo vang.

En teh, Kalvari tlang chungah,
Thukna puite a keh chhia;
Pathian hmangaihin a khuahte,
A puakdarh a va tihzia!

Pathian hmangaihna leh lainatna,
Mihring lamah a luang kawp;
Felna leh hmangaih inremin,
Khawvel thiam lo hi an fawp.
